hero.title: The Investigation Begins
hero.subtitle: Enter a sacred container for culture, craft, and community
hero.description: Join the mystery that shapes the story. Reserve your place in the August 2025 event where theories become truth.

value_proposition.tagline: Join the mystery. Shape the story. Become an accomplice in truth.
points: Authentic narratives rooted in cultural commentary

faq.question: When does the investigation begin?
faq.answer: The first major event launches August 2025. Early access to the Vessel companion app begins before then.

faq.question: What is the Vessel app?
faq.answer: Your investigation companion featuring Theory Boards, Cultural Code Library, and collaborative storytelling tools.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: Event access starts at $15. The Vessel app will offer a 7-day free trial with subscription options.
